commands.name: oc login

commands.commandLine:
echo "Squash version used from Solo.io" && \
squashctl --version
commands.name: Squash Version

commands.commandLine:
oc new-app /projects/labs/ --strategy=docker --context-dir=catalog-go --name=catalog-v2 --labels app=catalog,group=com.redhat.cloudnative,provider=fabric8,version=2.0 && \
oc start-build catalog-v2 --from-dir /projects/labs/catalog-go/ --follow && \
oc patch dc/catalog-v2 --patch '{"spec": {"template": {"metadata": {"annotations": {"sidecar.istio.io/inject": "true"}}}}}' && \
echo "Catalog V2 in Go Language and Integration of Istio Sidecar"
commands.name: Option: Catalog V2  in Go

commands.commandLine:
username=${workspace.namespace}
projectname=coolstore${username#user}
oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dwojciec/debugging-lab-summit-2019/master/openshift/coolstore.yml -p COOLSTORE_PROJECT=${projectname} | oc create -f - && \
oc start-build catalog-s2i --from-dir /projects/labs/catalog-spring-boot/ && \
oc start-build inventory-s2i --from-dir /projects/labs/inventory-thorntail/ --follow && \
oc start-build gateway-s2i --from-dir /projects/labs/gateway-vertx/ && \
oc start-build web --from-dir /projects/labs/web-nodejs/
commands.name: Build Mysterious Application
Debug Squash Inventory
Delete Squash Attachments

commands.commandLine:
username=${workspace.namespace}
project_name=coolstore${username#user}
url=http://istio-ingressgateway.istio-system.svc/${project_name}/api/products
echo "$url"
response=$(curl --write-out %{http_code} --silent --output /dev/null $url)
if [ "${response}" == "200" ]
then
    while true; do 
        if curl -s ${url} | grep -q OFFICIAL
        then
            echo "Gateway => Catalog GoLang (v2)";
        else
            echo "Gateway => Catalog Spring Boot (v1)";
        fi
        sleep 1
    done
else
    echo "Error ${response} when calling ${url}";
fi
commands.name: testGatewayService
